Package model

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Appointment
  • public class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
    Appointment class allows the storing and manipulation of customer data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Clears the list of appointments NOTE: DOES NOT UPDATE THE DATABASE; This method is for clearing data when logging out of the application.

      • addAppointmentLocally

        public static void addAppointmentLocally​(Appointment appointment)
        Adds an appointment to appointment list without updating the database. Used for populating appointment table with database content.
        Parameters:
        appointment - the appointment to add.
